column4: if i install Ubuntu onto my ps3 will i be able to navigate the same way i can on the ps3 OS?
with my controller i mean
if i install Ubuntu onto my ps3 will i be able to navigate with my controller?
after installing ubuntu 8.10 i applied the first set of updates. i restarted and my wired internet stopped working. how do i fix it?
after installing ubuntu 8.10 i applied the first set of updates. i restarted and my wired internet stopped working. how do i fix it?
type "ifconfig" at the command prompt
it will be very easy to get your wireless working again
let's troubleshoot
im gonna install 8.10 will you be on in for a couple hours? i need to update so it will be messed up so i can fix it
what version are you running?
I had trouble with some wired connections....but 8.10 fixed my problems
8.10 is where my wired internet messed up. after the first update it stopped working
(1) have you tried rebooting after the updates?  (2) what does "ifconfig" give,  (3) also try "route -n" at the terminal
ok np
will you be here in about 2 hours?
there is a good chance i will be here
actually, can you just tell me what update not to do?
i am not sure which update not to do.  I am certain the problem could be fixed in less time than a full install
ahhhhh that could be it
yeah i would reinstall to get back to 8.10 if you want stability
im gonna reinstall, update, and come back here with a nearby wireless
you there?
i'm here
i have no idea which one...can you give me a list?  or can you select one package at a time until it crashes?  or can you just not update?
